titles.title: To provide an educational experience in the United States to children from areas affected by civil strife in Ireland.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E654-655)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Provides for grants to local educational agencies to give children from areas affected by civil strife in Ireland an opportunity for an educational experience in the United States.
